author: retke (El Laggron)
description:
An alternative to the core moderation cog, similar to Dyno.
The cog allows you to take actions against member and keep track with a new modlog system. It also sends a DM to the warned members.

This is the rewrite of the V2 BetterMod cog. **Note that this cog conflicts with Warnings which must be unloaded.**
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the warnsystem cog. Please check the wiki for all informations about the cog.
https://laggrons-dumb-cogs.readthedocs.io/warnsystem.html

Type `[p]help WarnSystem` for a quick overview of the commands
**This cog conflicts with Warnings which must be unloaded.**
short: Moderation tools, providing an alternative to core Red.
